translation: The bright and dark paths of the world are thought to be eternal; one leads to no return, and the other leads to return.
commentary: 8.26 white and black bright and dark? Speed (two) paths? Hi verily? These these? Jagatah of the world? Shasvate eternal? Mate are thought? One by one? Yati (he) goes? anavrttim to nonreturn? By another by another? returns (he) returns? again again.Commentary The bright path is the path to the gods taken by the devotees.
